columns.name: organisation_path
columns.dc:title: Organisation Path
columns.schema:description: A sequence of colon separated Organisation Keys that fully specifies the Provider Organisation providing a service to the client.

columns.name: measure_key
columns.dc:title: Measure Key
columns.schema:description: This is a number or code assigned to each instance of a measure. The Measure Key is unique and stable for each instance of a measure at the level of the organisation.

columns.name: collection_occasion_key
columns.dc:title: Collection Occasion Key
columns.schema:description: This is a number or code assigned to each collection occasion of service activity. The Collection Occasion Key is unique and stable for each collection occasion at the level of the organisation.

columns.name: sidas_item1
columns.dc:title: SIDAS - Question 1
columns.schema:description: In the past month, how often have you had thoughts about suicide?

columns.name: sidas_item2
columns.dc:title: SIDAS - Question 2
columns.schema:description: In the past month, how much control have you had over these thoughts?

columns.name: sidas_item3
columns.dc:title: SIDAS - Question 3
columns.schema:description: In the past month, how close have you come to making an attempt?

columns.name: sidas_item4
columns.dc:title: SIDAS - Question 4
columns.schema:description: In the past month, to what extent have you felt tormented by thoughts about suicide?

columns.name: sidas_item5
columns.dc:title: SIDAS - Question 5
columns.schema:description: In the past month, how much have thoughts about suicide interfered with your ability to carry out daily activities, such as work, household tasks or social activities?

columns.name: sidas_tags
columns.dc:title: SIDAS - Tags
columns.schema:description: List of tags for the collection occasion.
